p: The chemical constituents of D. viscosa hexane fraction (DVHF) were determined using gas chromatography and a mass spectrometer (Turbomass, PerkinElmer, Inc., Waltham, MA, USA). The temperature of program 4 was set to 40°C, followed by a 2 min hold, and then raised to 200°C at a rate of 5°C min −1, which was also then put on hold for 2 min. From 200°C, the temperature was raised by 5°C min −1 to 300°C and held for another 2 min. The mass spectra of DVHF compounds were also compared with those of similar compounds in the Adams Library [ 20] and the Wiley GC/MS Library [ 21].
